home.hero_subtitle: Your files, your control. End-to-end encrypted sharing that protects your privacy with military-grade security.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: Your files are encrypted in your browser before upload. Only you and authorized recipients can access them.

sharing.title: Secure Sharing
sharing.description: Share files with password-protected links that expire automatically for maximum security.

performance.title: Fast & Reliable
performance.description: Built with modern web technologies for fast uploads, downloads, and real-time collaboration.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your data never leaves your control. Zero-knowledge architecture ensures your privacy.

multiformat.title: Multi-Format Support
multiformat.description: Upload any file type - documents, videos, audio, images, and more up to 100MB securely.

realtime.title: Real-Time Encryption
realtime.description: Files encrypted instantly in your browser with progress indicators and instant sharing.

crypvault.title: CrypVault Offline
crypvault.description: Store and encrypt files offline. Access your secure vault anywhere, even without internet.

about.title: About Cryptee
about.creator_desc: Cryptee was created by MvogoNka Christophe Ulrich, a passionate developer dedicated to building secure and privacy-focused applications.
about.mission_desc: Cryptee is a secure, end-to-end encrypted file sharing web application that prioritizes user privacy and data security. Files are encrypted client-side before transmission and can only be decrypted by authorized recipients.

features_list.encryption: End-to-End Encryption: AES-256-GCM encryption (same as banks use)
features_list.sharing: Secure Sharing: Time-limited, password-protected sharing links with expiration controls
features_list.auth: User Authentication: JWT-based authentication with scrypt password hashing
features_list.management: File Management: Upload, organize, and manage encrypted files with version control
features_list.ui: Responsive UI: Modern, mobile-friendly interface with smooth navigation
features_list.performance: High Performance: Optimized for 50+ concurrent users with connection pooling
features_list.destruct: Self-Destructing Files: Automatic file deletion after expiration or download limits
features_list.tracking: Activity Tracking: Complete history of sent and received files
features_list.support: Multi-Format Support: Documents, videos, audio, images, and any file type up to 100MB
features_list.realtime: Real-Time Encryption: Client-side encryption with progress indicators
features_list.protection: Password Protection: Dual-layer security with encryption keys and share passwords
features_list.security: Account Security: Login attempt monitoring with automatic account locking
features_list.settings: Settings Management: Language, theme, and notification preferences
features_list.help: Help & Support: Comprehensive documentation with step-by-step guides
features_list.reporting: Bug Reporting: Integrated feedback system with browser information
features_list.limiting: Rate Limiting: Protection against abuse with configurable limits
features_list.logging: Audit Logging: Complete activity tracking for security and compliance
features_list.mobile: Mobile Navigation: Bottom navigation bar optimized for mobile devices
features_list.accessibility: Accessibility: WCAG compliant with keyboard navigation and screen reader support
features_list.standards: Modern Web Standards: Built with HTML5, CSS3, and ES6+ JavaScript

about.crychat_desc: CryChat is Cryptee's integrated secure messaging system that brings encrypted communication to your file sharing platform.

security_list.e2e: End-to-End Encryption: All messages are encrypted client-side before transmission
security_list.no_phone: No Phone Numbers: Users identified by usernames, Cryptee IDs, and email addresses
security_list.self_destruct: Self-Destructing Messages: Messages automatically disappear after set time periods
security_list.rate_limit: Rate Limiting: Anti-brute force protection with message rate controls
security_list.user_search: Secure User Search: Find and connect with other users privately

ux_list.themes: Custom Themes: Choose from multiple chat themes (Default, Dark, Blue, Green, Purple)
ux_list.realtime: Real-Time Messaging: Instant message delivery with conversation management
ux_list.mobile: Mobile Optimized: Responsive design that works on all devices
ux_list.expiration: Message Expiration: Set messages to expire from 30 seconds to 7 days
ux_list.history: Conversation History: Keep track of all your secure conversations

about.crychat_note: CryChat ensures your private conversations remain private, with military-grade encryption and user-friendly features.

tech_list.backend: Backend: Python Flask with SQLAlchemy ORM and connection pooling
tech_list.frontend: Frontend: HTML5, CSS3, and ES6+ JavaScript
tech_list.encryption: Encryption: Web Crypto API with AES-256-GCM and PBKDF2
tech_list.auth: Authentication: JWT tokens with scrypt password hashing
tech_list.deployment: Deployment: Docker containerization with Nginx reverse proxy

faq.security_answer: Cryptee uses military-grade AES-256-GCM encryption. Files are encrypted in your browser before upload, and only you and authorized recipients can access them.
faq.file_size: What is the maximum file size?
faq.file_size_answer: You can upload files up to 100MB in size.
faq.expiration: How long do shared links last?
faq.expiration_answer: You can set expiration times from minutes to months, or make links permanent.
faq.browsers_answer: Cryptee works on all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge.
faq.mobile_answer: Yes! Cryptee is fully responsive and works great on phones and tablets.
